titleStmt.title: July 26, a diurnall and particula[r] of the last weekes daily occurrents from His Maiesty, in severall places from Iuly the 16. to this present, 1642.
titleStmt.author: I. P. Letter sent from Leicester to a worthy lady in this city.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. F. for D. C.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at head of t.p.: July 26.
"A letter sent from Leicester to a worthy lady in this city" (p. 7-8) signed I.P.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
